answers.answer: Hello,What you seem, to be having is called polyuria.The first possibility that needs to be ruled out is diabetes mellitus and diabetes insipidus.I would suggest that you get your blood sugar levels estimated.If the symptoms persist then pls get other possibilities ruled out.The other possibilities are interstitial cystitis, interstitial nephritis,lupus,hypercalcemia,hyperthyroidism,hypopituitarism,hypoaldosteronism,hypokalemia,renal glycosuria,Addison’s disease and polycythemia.Pls consult a urologist and get these possibilities ruled out.I hope that helps. Take care and regards.

question: i have been having this problem for years, I have always had the need to urinate, sometimes 2-3 times before i go to sleep at nights and even in the daytime. sometimes it is not a lot of urine that comes out. i am 25 year old female found out i had pcos about 2 years ago.
title: frequent urination
